references.reason: This paper is foundational to the study of individualized treatment rules (ITRs) and their estimation using observational data.

references.paper_title: Personalized dose finding using outcome weighted learning
references.reason: This paper introduces outcome weighted learning, a key technique used in many ITR estimation methods.

references.paper_title: Multi-armed angle-based direct learning for estimating optimal individualized treatment rules with various outcomes
references.reason: This paper introduces angle-based direct learning which is the basis for the proposed multi-category treatment ITR method.
This paper introduces energy balancing weights, a crucial component of the proposed framework for robust ITR estimation.

references.paper_title: Performance guarantees for individualized treatment rules
references.reason: This paper provides theoretical guarantees for ITR estimation, which are extended in the current work.
